attributes.action: Change the rule on how many people you can see socially indoor and outdoor
attributes.additional_details: The new rule that limits the number of people that can meet indoor and outdoor to 6 penalises larger families, making it illegal to have a simple family get together such as both sets of grandparents. I ask for the rule to be amended as per the new rule in Scotland and Wales.
attributes.background: I ask for the Government to exclude children under 12 from the new rule, which limits the number of people that can meet outdoor or indoor to 6.
